name: Draw It!
description: Draw it! With the help of drawing and physics - help the smiley to get to the platform.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+,Windows 7, Windows 8,Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Interl HD graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 60 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+,Windows 7, Windows 8,Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Interl HD graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 60 MB available space
